about_the_game:
Abomifighters: World League is a local coop and online brawler game for up to 4 players. You assemble your character from different body parts and fight your way to victory!



• Build absolutely crazy characters. Attach anything to anything: sharkosaurus, broccocopter, zombiecentaurus – it’s up to you to create your own avatar.
• Unique character creation system: Each limb changes the way you move and fight. You can punch out limbs from your enemies, pick it to retain their abilities and recreate your avatar right in the game.
• Crazy levels: Avoid traps and collect power ups in real world-like levels.
• Co-op or Free-For-All: Team up with your friends and fight with your enemies online. Or be friends with no one in ruthless free for all fights!
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD!!


About the Game

Abomifighters: World League is a local coop and online brawler game for up to 4 players. You assemble your character from different body parts and fight your way to victory!



• Build absolutely crazy characters. Attach anything to anything: sharkosaurus, broccocopter, zombiecentaurus – it’s up to you to create your own avatar.
• Unique character creation system: Each limb changes the way you move and fight. You can punch out limbs from your enemies, pick it to retain their abilities and recreate your avatar right in the game.
• Crazy levels: Avoid traps and collect power ups in real world-like levels.
• Co-op or Free-For-All: Team up with your friends and fight with your enemies online. Or be friends with no one in ruthless free for all fights!
ext_user_account_notice: Epic Online Services (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Abomifighters: World League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Abomifighters: World League is a local coop and online arcade fighting game, where you assemble your character from different body parts. Each body part has its own unique skill. Create your crazy character and win the brawl! 🦿💪🦾🦶🦵👂
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Japanese
